title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple pull-run workflow.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server—chat, generate, pull, and manage models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings; chat, stream, embed, and push/pull models programmatically.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering LLM, chat, and embedding interfaces backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with streaming, chat, and embedding support; Maven Central available.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM code completion via Ollama (inline suggestions, chat panel).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented-Generation stack using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector and autoscaling.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible Ollama builds and dev shells for macOS/Linux.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async chat, vision, and embeddings; NuGet package available.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repo tracking community SDKs (Go, Ruby, PHP, Dart, Swift) maintained by Ollama team.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI note assistance using Ollama (summarize, rewrite, Q&A).

title: ollama discord bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models to servers with slash commands and moderation.

title: ollama-model-librarian
summary: CLI tool to curate and share private model registries behind corporate proxies.
